channel.title: Ad_configurations on Fluid Player Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Ad_configurations on Fluid Player Documentation

item.title: Ad Configuration
item.description: There are optional parameters that can be used to customise the Fluid Player ad serving. No parameters are required and will default if not passed through. Vast options relate to the ads served and the how the player handles them These options are specifically for when ads are shown in the player. fluidPlayer( 'my-video', { vastOptions: { adList: {}, skipButtonCaption: 'Skip ad in [seconds]', skipButtonClickCaption: 'Skip ad <span class="skip_button_icon"></span>', adText: null, adTextPosition: 'top left', adCTAText: 'Visit now!
